Package emissary.util

Class MetadataDictionaryUtil

java.lang.Object
emissary.util.MetadataDictionaryUtil
@Deprecated public class MetadataDictionaryUtil extends Object
Deprecated.
This class takes an alternate view byte stream and changes the metadata labels to be consistent with the MetadataDictionary

    • map

      public byte[] map(byte[] input) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Get the view, map the first token on each line. The view should be structured as "key value" where the first space on the line separates the key from the rest.
      Parameters:
      input - the bytes of the view to be mapped
      Returns:
      a byte[] containing transformed/alphabetized keys with their value pairs
      Throws:
      IOException

    • convertMapToByteArray

      public static byte[] convertMapToByteArray(Map<String,Collection<String>> metadata) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Converts a map of key/values into a byte array. Each key/value will be output on a separate line in alphabetical order by key in map.
      Parameters:
      metadata - the Map of metadata to convert
      Returns:
      a byte[] of key/values on individual lines in alphabetical order
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is some I/O problem.

    • convertMapToByteArray

      public static byte[] convertMapToByteArray(Map<String,Collection<String>> kv, ByteArrayOutputStream output) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Converts a map of key/values into a byte array. Each key/value will be output on a separate line in alphabetical order by key in map.
      Parameters:
      kv - the Map of metadata to convert
      output - a ByteArrayOutputStream to write the key/value pairs to
      Returns:
      a byte[] of key/values on individual lines in alphabetical order
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is some I/O problem.

    • convertLinesToMap

      public Map<String,Collection<String>> convertLinesToMap(byte[] input, ByteArrayOutputStream output) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Read each line of input, tokenize them into key/value pairs, perform a lookup/transformation of the keys via the MetadataDictionary where applicable, and return the results as a map.
      Parameters:
      input - the bytes to convert
      output - a ByteArrayOutputStream to write failed parse attempts to
      Returns:
      a Map containing each line converted to a key/value pair and sorted alphabetically by key
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is some I/O problem.
